error.message:
Error activating IUserDictionaryLookup No matching bindings are available, and the type is not self-bindable. Activation path: 2) Injection of dependency IUserDictionaryLookup into parameter dictionaryLookup of constructor of type RussianAnalyzerController 1) Request for RussianAnalyzerController
Suggestions: 1) Ensure that you have defined a binding for IUserDictionaryLookup. 2) If the binding was defined in a module, ensure that the module has been loaded into the kernel. 3) Ensure you have not accidentally created more than one kernel. 4) If you are using constructor arguments, ensure that the parameter name matches the constructors parameter name. 5) If you are using automatic module loading, ensure the search path and filters are correct.
error.detail:

Make sure that the controller has a parameterless public constructor. ---> System.InvalidOperationException: An error occurred when trying to create a controller of type 'RussianAnalyzerController'. Make sure that the controller has a parameterless public constructor. ---> Ninject.ActivationException: Error activating IUserDictionaryLookup No matching bindings are available, and the type is not self-bindable. Activation path: 2) Injection of dependency IUserDictionaryLookup into parameter dictionaryLookup of constructor of type RussianAnalyzerController 1) Request for RussianAnalyzerController
Suggestions: 1) Ensure that you have defined a binding for IUserDictionaryLookup. 2) If the binding was defined in a module, ensure that the module has been loaded into the kernel. 3) Ensure you have not accidentally created more than one kernel. 4) If you are using constructor arguments, ensure that the parameter name matches the constructors parameter name. 5) If you are using automatic module loading, ensure the search path and filters are correct.

error.webHostHtmlMessage:
Server Error in '/' Application.

Error activating IUserDictionaryLookup
No matching bindings are available, and the type is not self-bindable.
Activation path:
 2) Injection of dependency IUserDictionaryLookup into parameter dictionaryLookup of constructor of type RussianAnalyzerController
 1) Request for RussianAnalyzerController

Suggestions:
 1) Ensure that you have defined a binding for IUserDictionaryLookup.
 2) If the binding was defined in a module, ensure that the module has been loaded into the kernel.
 3) Ensure you have not accidentally created more than one kernel.
 4) If you are using constructor arguments, ensure that the parameter name matches the constructors parameter name.
 5) If you are using automatic module loading, ensure the search path and filters are correct.

Description: An error occurred when trying to create a controller of type 'RussianAnalyzerController'. Make sure that the controller has a parameterless public constructor.

Exception Details: Ninject.ActivationException: Error activating IUserDictionaryLookup
No matching bindings are available, and the type is not self-bindable.
Activation path:
 2) Injection of dependency IUserDictionaryLookup into parameter dictionaryLookup of constructor of type RussianAnalyzerController
 1) Request for RussianAnalyzerController

Suggestions:
 1) Ensure that you have defined a binding for IUserDictionaryLookup.
 2) If the binding was defined in a module, ensure that the module has been loaded into the kernel.
 3) Ensure you have not accidentally created more than one kernel.
 4) If you are using constructor arguments, ensure that the parameter name matches the constructors parameter name.
 5) If you are using automatic module loading, ensure the search path and filters are correct.


Source Error:

An unhandled exception was generated during the execution of the current web request. Information regarding the origin and location of the exception can be identified using the exception stack trace below.

Stack Trace:

No matching bindings are available, and the type is not self-bindable.
Activation path:
  2) Injection of dependency IUserDictionaryLookup into parameter dictionaryLookup of constructor of type RussianAnalyzerController
  1) Request for RussianAnalyzerController

Suggestions:
  1) Ensure that you have defined a binding for IUserDictionaryLookup.
  2) If the binding was defined in a module, ensure that the module has been loaded into the kernel.
  3) Ensure you have not accidentally created more than one kernel.
  4) If you are using constructor arguments, ensure that the parameter name matches the constructors parameter name.
  5) If you are using automatic module loading, ensure the search path and filters are correct.
]
